attributes.action: fathers to have 50/50 access to children after separation/ divorce
attributes.additional_details:
this petition is to allow every father who is denied access to the children under no grounds to be granted by law immediate 50/50 shared access to their children after separation/divorce.
no father should have to pay to only see there child for 4 days per month (1 over night stay every other weekend)
attributes.background: for all fathers to have immediate shared access to their children and not just weekend contact. currently in most cases fathers access is limited to 4 days per month, whereas the mother gains immediate access over the children and can choose when the father sees them.
